plot: Lightman, a robot, always sleeps late and has a bad memory, so he has to run and run to get where he's going.
title: Run Lightman
plot_es: Lightman, a robot, always sleeps late and has a bad memory, so he has to run and run to get where he's going.
plot_en: Lightman, a robot, always sleeps late and has a bad memory, so he has to run and run to get where he's going.
